page.title: 12SUMMERFIELD RIDING SCHOOL
page.content: Summerfield riding school owned by the Barnes family, takes people of all ages. The school has four horses of their own and two which are not. Two ponies are ridden for lessons. Mr Barnes makes pottery and sells it. Mr Barnes mother teaches piano. Three people work for Mrs Barnes, two teach riding, one man grooms and exercises the horses and does handy work. Mrs and Mr Barnes own about five acres of land. The school is made up of a house, a barn, a pottery studio and the stables.
